abstract: Aslan Cherkesov id sentenced to 20 years in prison for the December 2010 murder of a Slavic soccer fan that incited an ethnic riot in Moscow.
snippet: Aslan Cherkesov was sentenced to 20 years in prison on Friday for the murder of a Slavic soccer fan that incited an ethnic riot in Moscow last December.
lead_paragraph: Aslan Cherkesov was sentenced to 20 years in prison on Friday for the murder of a Slavic soccer fan that incited an ethnic riot in Moscow last December.

headline.main: Russia: Gunman Is Sentenced in Killing That Led to Ethnic Riots
headline.print_headline: Russia: Gunman Is Sentenced In Killing That Led to Ethnic Riots
headline.seo: Russia: Man Sentenced In Killing That Led to Riots
